newsitem.title: GERMANY: Debis takes majority stake in software gp Bankware.
newsitem.headline: Debis takes majority stake in software gp Bankware.

text.p: Germany's Debis Systemhaus GmbH said on Friday it had taken a 51 percent stake in a Frankfurt-based company Bankware GmbH & Co KG.
Debis said in a statement that the investment would allow its to offer integrated solutions for the trading, treasury and risk management departments of banks.
Debis said its new service range would allow debis also to offer solutions generally within industry in these areas.
It said its services would include the setting-up of trading platforms and risk management and even a bank's full controlling system.
Bankware specialises in software for trading in shares, money/foreign exchange, and derivatives as well as in the integration of digital trading platforms.
